kernel.kstart_0_debug: Starting up PyT2 in debug mode with kernel

kernel.kernel_danger: [WARNING] !!! Kernel/PyT dangerous/developer functions enabled, don`t except security and stable performance!
kernel.kernel_safe:
[SAFE MODE] Kernel running in safe mode. Modifying kernel options to safely run. (Old configs will be copied to /etc/)
[WARNING] All modifications to boot.json, kernel_sets.json and build_prop.json in this session will be deleted.

pyt.welcome:
Welcome to PyT2!

{%s}Thank you, Shamus Rezol for this very beautiful parsing module! {%d}
pyt.invalid_command: [ERROR] Unknown command or executable with name {cmd}
pyt.unknown_kpanic: PyT 2 cannot work because unknown error!

Current root is {root}
Type chroot to change root.

plm.welcome: Welcome to PLM, login into to continue.
plm.login:
Log-in into your account. If your account has no password, don`t type anything in password.
First is a username and second is a password
